CylCS¶

class decodes.core.dc_cs.CylCS(pt=pt[0,0,0])¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_base.Geometry, decodes.core.dc_base.Basis

a cylindrical coordinate system

__init__(pt=pt[0,0,0])¶
eval(a, b=None, c=0)¶

Returns a Point from this CS to a Cylindrical CS.

Parameters:
  • a (Point or float) – Point or decimal number.
  • b (None or float) – None or decimal number.
  • c (None or float) – None or decimal number.
Result :

A Point in a Cylindrical CS.
Return type:

Point
